personas.name: Agent Orchestrator
personas.description: Spends all day correcting the 'intelligent' mistakes of autonomous systems.
personas.evolvedDescription: You don't just manage bots; you compose symphonies from the discord of automation. You find the human note in the digital noise.

personas.name: Coffee Badger
personas.description: Masters the art of being visible for the free snacks and invisible for the actual work.
personas.evolvedDescription: Your presence isn't about avoiding work; it's about creating the random collisions that spark breakthrough ideas. You are the human algorithm for innovation.

personas.name: Resenteeism Rogue
personas.description: Mentally quit months ago, but the paycheck has a magnetic personality.
personas.evolvedDescription: You endure the corporate storms with a quiet strength. Your resilience is a testament to the human spirit's ability to find purpose even in the absurd.

personas.name: Pyromancer of Files
personas.description: Finds catharsis in mass-deleting legacy documents and ignoring the screams from legal.
personas.evolvedDescription: You don't just shred paper; you curate mental space. You are the fire that clears the brush so new ideas can grow.

personas.name: Human Legacy Asset
personas.description: Basically a vintage classic. Too expensive to maintain, too iconic to replace.
personas.evolvedDescription: You are not outdated; you are the foundation. You carry the stories, the lessons, and the soul of the company that no database can ever hold.
